title: Hidden Shift
description: Hidden Shift benchmark schema definition, describing parameters for the benchmark.

benchmark_name.description: Name of the benchmark. Must be 'Hidden Shift' for this schema.

num_shots.description: Number of measurement shots (repetitions) to use for each circuit in the benchmark.

min_qubits.description: Minimum number of qubits to start generating circuits for the benchmark.

max_qubits.description: Maximum number of qubits to stop generating circuits for the benchmark.

skip_qubits.description: The step size for generating circuits from the min to max qubit sizes.

max_circuits.description: Maximum number of circuits generated for each qubit size in the benchmark.

method.description: Which QED-C method to run the benchmark with.

input_value.description: Specifies the secret int for the benchmark; note that max_circuits must be 1 if this is used.
